front.title: A Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) Event Package for Conference State

abstract.t: This document defines a conference event package for tightly coupled conferences using the Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) Events framework, along with a data format used in notifications for this package. The conference package allows users to subscribe to a conference URI. Notifications are sent about changes in the membership of this conference and optionally about changes in the state of additional conference components.
